sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceDatabase] = 'Call'
	  AND [SourceSchema] = '8x8'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
	  AND [IsLoadTesting] = 0
ORDER BY [SourceObject] ASC

properties.description: This pipeline run at the root folder

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Inbound'
      AND [SourceDatabase] = 'Call'
	  AND [SourceSchema] = '8x8'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
ORDER BY [SourceObject]

SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Inbound'
      AND [SourceDatabase] = 'Call'
	  AND [SourceSchema] = '8x8'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
ORDER BY [SourceObject]

properties.description: This pipeline run against the FTP archive folder
